channel.title: research on Damien Saunders | Management Marketing Consultant
channel.description: Recent content in research on Damien Saunders | Management Marketing Consultant

item.title: Android Apps - 400% growth rate YOY
item.description: Android in numbers - thankfully the Google I/O conference helped out by publishing statistics which give some insight to the growth in adoption of smartphones and also help to provide a hint of reality.

item.title: NEWS: Price Grabber research says we spend more on the mobile
item.description: Finally some proof that Mobile Internet usage is profoundly shaking up the way consumers shop, according to new research from PriceGrabber.

item.title: What kids do online: UK Internet Usage
item.description: Recent indepth report from New Media Age in the UK focused on the internet usage habits of kids.

item.title: Looking for insights on Mobile and Retail Sector?
item.description: GS1, a global standards organisation dedicated to the design and implementation of global standards and solutions in supply and demand chains worldwide, has released a Whitepaper looking at the opportunities for mobile in the retail sector.

item.title: Gartner Says Consumers Will Download 4,500,000,000 Mobile Apps in 2010
item.description: This week Gartner reported that consumers will spend a headline figure of Â£3.

item.title: Social Media & Marketing Round-up of some good reading
item.description: **The problem with doing research on social media and mobile marketing is the overwhelming amount of noise you get from doing searches on Google, Delicious and Twitter.

item.title: Comparison of Digital Music Retailers in Europe
item.description: Comment: There are a number of digital music retailers working around Europe, here is Damien Saunders’ summary of a few of the bigger services (catalogue greater than 1 million tracks).

item.title: Music file sharing on the up and up
item.description: Damien Saunders says -research shows continued growth in file-sharing and downloading of mp3s is now common place.
